quest.name: A Pisaca's Purpose
journal:
 Quest Sync
Qeryde is short on materials and time.
objectives: Slay a guhasaya and obtain its corpse.
Place the guhasaya corpse at the designated location.
Lie in wait at the designated location and slay the old pisaca when it appears.
Deliver the glimmering pisaca scales to Qeryde.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: Oh, you're the one who slew that terrible beast, aren't you? Big and brawny─just the type of womanman I'm looking for. I have a job that I believe will suit you perfectly. There's a reward at the end of it, if that motivates you to keep listening.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: I make my living as a weaver, and I've had an idea to craft armor for the Radiant Host that defend our walls. However, the scales I require are in short supply.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: Scales from long-lived pisaca are nigh indestructible, but such animals lead quick and brutal lives. Finding an aged specimen is difficult─slaying one even more so.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: Still, they are animals all the same, and cannot resist the allure of fresh meat. If you were to use the corpse of a guhasaya, then the scent of its blood will surely draw out a prize specimen. It's a somewhat dangerous task, but I suspect you've seen much worse.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: First, slay a guhasaya, then use its corpse to draw out a pisaca. I'm sure you're already well familiar with the process from there.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: How goes the hunt? Do you have the scales?

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: Why, these are even more splendid than I could've imagined. The pisaca are dangerous prey, to be sure, but the reward from conquering them is well worth it.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: In our legends they are portrayed as devils that feast upon the flesh of man. The goddess Minduruva brought one low by piercing its eye, as nowhere else would yield to her weapon.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: The legends have an onze of truth to them, for over many years, the pisaca's scales become imbued with metallic substances. By weaving them into thread, one can make a material of uncommon strength.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: Surely our defenders would appreciate garments made of such material, yes? I cannot fight myself, but if such skills as I possess can help us through this struggle, then I must do what I can.

dialogue.name: QERYDE
dialogue.text: And for your part in aiding me in this, take this. You deserve it.
